trial_type.Description: Categorical code referring to stimulus condition

Levels.electrical_stimulation: electrodes were stimulated during this trial

sample_start.Description: Stimulus onset in samples relative to the start of the run

sample_end.Description: Stimulus offset in samples relative to the start of the run

electrical_stimulation_site.Description: names of electrodes separated by a - that were stimulated

electrical_stimulation_site_num.Description: numbers of electrodes separated by a - that were stimulated

status.Description: was a trial good or bad
